i1.name: Deadly Venom
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Twitch's''' [[basic attack]]s {{tip|poison}} his target with ''Deadly Venom'', each attack adding one stack [[on-hit]].

Each ''Deadly Venom'' stack deals {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|5|1 to 5|1 to 17|formula=1 every 4 levels}}|true damage}} {{tip|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}} per second over 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times for a maximum of {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|5|1*6 to 5*6|1 to 17|formula=6 every 4 levels}}|true damage}} {{as|true damage}} per second.
Each application of ''Deadly Venom'' refreshes the duration.
i1.notes:
* The enhanced attacks will apply other on-hit effects and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage cannot).
* ''Deadly Venom'' does not affect structures.
* ''Deadly Venom'' cannot be {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}} nor {{tip|blocked}} but can be {{tip|dodged}} and/or missed if '''Twitch''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* ''Deadly Venom'' interacts with {{ai|Twin Fang|Cassiopeia}} (thus granting {{ci|Cassiopeia}} its bonus effects).

w1.name: Venom Cask
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Twitch''' hurls a cask of venom at the target area, infecting all enemies hit with a {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} stack and {{tip|sight|revealing}} the area.
The target area becomes contaminated for 3 seconds, applying a {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} stack each second and {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies inside it.
w1.notes: * ''Venom Cask'' can apply a maximum of 4 {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} stacks per enemy.

e1.name: Contaminate
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Twitch''' sends out a lethal toxin to each nearby enemy afflicted by {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}}, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}}, increased for each stack on the target.
''Contaminate can be cast regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of targets or not.''
e1.notes:
* '''Twitch''' is given a range indicator for ''Contaminate's'' radius upon infecting an enemy champion with {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} (actual range is slightly larger than shown in-game).
* ''Contaminate'' will not damage enemy targets whose {{ai|Deadly Venom|Twitch}} stacks wear off or if they move out of ''Contaminate's'' range before '''Twitch''' can cast.

effects.levelingtext:
{{st|Base Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}}}}
{{st|Bonus Damage Per Stack|{{ap|15 to 35}} {{as|(+ 35% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Minimum Damage|{{ap|20+15 to 60+35}} {{as|(+ 35% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|20+15*6 to 60+35*6}} {{as|(+ 210% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}}}

r1.name: Spray and Pray
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Twitch''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}} and {{sti|range|300 '''bonus''' attack range}} for 5 seconds, during which his {{tip|basic attack|basic attacks}} are replaced by ''bolts'' that travel slightly further than his attack range in a straight line, damaging {{tt|every enemy|non-champions and champions, wards and plants, turrets and structures}} in their path.

The ''bolts'' deal {{passive progression/deprecated version|6|key=%|type=enemy hit|100*0.8^(x-1);40|x-1|formula=100%*0.8^(1 per enemy hit). ''This is capped at 40% damage.''}} {{sti|{{as|physical damage}}}}, apply {{tip|on-hit}} effects to and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} against each individual target.
r1.notes:
* ''Spray and Pray'' allows '''Twitch''' to outrange {{tip|turret|turrets}} by 50 units, allowing him to hit them without them returning fire.
* There is a brief delay before the ''bolts'' reach targets at range due to finite missile speed, allowing even the primary target to physically dodge the attack.
* The ''bolt'' projectiles will naturally pass through terrain and enemy structures (the latter will be damaged by ''bolts'' even if they are not directly targeted).
* The ''bolts'' will only strike units that are not {{tip|untargetable}}.
** {{pending for test}} {{tip|Blind}} interaction
* {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}} interacts with ''Spray and Pray's'' {{sti|'''bonus''' attack range}} but not with the modified missile effect (the secondary bolts will not have pass-through effects).
* Whenever the ''bolts'' penetrate a target, a small elongated cloud appears at the location, which's VFX and SFX '''can''' be seen and heard inside the Fog of War.
* The ''bolts<nowiki>'</nowiki>'' travel distance scales with the fully value of '''Twitch's''' {{sti|range|attack range}} increases such as {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}, but not with size increases (which only increase his effective attack range, thereby the target range).
* (Outdated as of [[V10.13]], now can hit everything with edge range, except for turrets) The {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} center of a unit must be within the maximum travel distance of the ''bolt'' missile, and in front of the spawn location ('''Twitch's''' {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} center) for the ''bolt'' to be able to hit them.
** Other than this condition, the ''bolt'' missile has to only touch (pass within its half width of 60 units) the {{tip|er|icononly = true}} edge of the unit's radius.
** This is standard behaviour for ''linear skillshots''.
